title: Barizaurus
author: Barizaurus
content: 3 months old, almost 100 days. I thing that the time is right to make a separate topic and talk intense about dinolfg.comBorn from the ashes of FTX collapse, regardless of the world economy and crypto space conditions. Dinolfg is showing how you build sustainable products with IRL useful utilities. How you create a powerful community and make partnerships that matter. Fear and lack of trust are pushing new investors and entrepreneurs back to the sideline. Making them wait “for better times”. The issue or should I say fact with DinoLFG is…they dont wait for better times - they are creating better times!  3 months in and done amazing things.Build a strong and creative community with over 4000 hodlers, almost 6000 TG members and 25k Twitter users. And the best thing ist the Team with some based and mysterious dev guru…this guys are the real big deal. They are working, building and gearing up for the next bull.Now is the time to build the product(s) and users base. So that everything can run smoothly when the markets flip to green.Great project with a lot of use cases…One more thing - the upcoming NFT collection will “destroy” the space. Forget the “fance” rock or ape Jpegs wit laser eyes. PREPARE FOR THE CRYPTO & NFT REVOLUTION !PREPARE FOR DINOLFG… https://dinolfg.com/https://twitter.com/DinoLFGhttps://t.me/OfficialDinoLFGhttps://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x19c10e1f20df3a8c2ac93a62d7fba719fa777026https://app.solidproof.io/projects/dinolfghttps://www.team.finance/view-coin/0xC36442b4a4522E871399CD717aBDD847Ab11FE88/360040?name=Uniswap%20-%201%25%20-%20DINO/WETH%20-%201.0000%3C%3E125900000000&symbol=UNI-V3-POS&chainid=0x1Join the discussion and have a wonderful Sunday

comments.author: Kenzoro13
comments.body: Hey there, glad you open a Thread about this one.I spot it also and i bought a bag of Dino. Im a huge NFT fan and i cant wait to mint those eggs. The team looks very strong, i like what they made in this short time.LFG

comments.author: DinoRitus
comments.body: A great thread, I see that DINOLFG is coming to change the rules of the game, a memecoin with real utility, with extraordinary associations, and they are going to release their NFTs soon. Are we facing a new gem of the Cryptocurrency world?
